overview.en: The public chain project focusing on the bottom of commercial applications in the payment and credit finance industries is a universal decentralized financial information platform and a new generation of Internet financial platform based on block chains..
overview.zh: 一个专注于支付、信贷金融行业商业应用底层的公有链项目，是一个通用的去中心化的金融信息平台，也是新一代的基于区块链的互联网金融平台。
